statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_violations
SELECT violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_date FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount >= 100 ORDER BY fine_amount ASC
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM traffic_violations GROUP BY violation_type
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' ORDER BY violation_date DESC, fine_amount ASC
SELECT violation_type, SUM(fine_amount) AS total_fine FROM traffic_violations GROUP BY violation_type ORDER BY total_fine DESC
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_date, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 1000 ORDER BY violation_id
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM traffic_violations GROUP BY violation_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND violation_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY violation_type
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_date FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100;
SELECT violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT driver_license_number, violation_type FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT violation_id, fine_amount, paid_flag FROM fines WHERE paid_flag = FALSE;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' ORDER BY violation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT driver_license_number, violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC

SELECT violation_type, violation_date, fine_amount, driver_license_number FROM traffic_violations JOIN fines ON traffic_violations.violation_id = fines.violation_id WHERE fines.paid_flag = FALSE AND fines.fine_amount > 200 ORDER BY violation_date ASC, fine_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT driver_license_number, violation_type, fine_amount, paid_flag FROM traffic_violations JOIN fines ON traffic_violations.violation_id = fines.violation_id ORDER BY fine_amount ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT SUM(fine_amount) AS total_fines FROM fines WHERE paid_flag = FALSE
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT vehicle_id, violation_type, violation_date FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT violation_id, fine_amount FROM fines WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT vehicle_id, owner_name FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT registration_number, fine_amount FROM vehicles JOIN traffic_violations ON vehicles.vehicle_id = traffic_violations.vehicle_id WHERE fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT violation_id, vehicle_id, violation_type, violation_date, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' ORDER BY violation_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT v.registration_number, v.owner_name, f.fine_amount, f.payment_date FROM vehicles v JOIN fines f ON v.vehicle_id = f.violation_id WHERE f.payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY f.payment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM traffic_violations GROUP BY violation_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_violations DESC;

SELECT v.vehicle_type, SUM(f.fine_amount) AS total_fines FROM vehicles v JOIN fines f ON v.vehicle_id = f.violation_id WHERE f.payment_status = 'Unpaid' GROUP BY v.vehicle_type ORDER BY total_fines DESC;

SELECT v.owner_name, COUNT(*) AS total_violations, AVG(f.fine_amount) AS avg_fine_amount FROM vehicles v JOIN fines f ON v.vehicle_id = f.violation_id GROUP BY v.owner_name HAVING total_violations > 2 ORDER BY avg_fine_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_date FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT officer_id, officer_name, badge_number FROM police_officers WHERE precinct = 'Downtown'

SELECT fine_payments.payment_id, fine_payments.payment_date, fine_payments.amount, traffic_violations.driver_license FROM fine_payments JOIN traffic_violations ON fine_payments.violation_id = traffic_violations.violation_id
SELECT MAX(fine_amount) AS max_fine FROM traffic_violations
SELECT violation_id, driver_license, violation_type, violation_date, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT officer_name, badge_number, precinct FROM police_officers WHERE precinct='Downtown';
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, violation_id, payment_date, amount FROM fine_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT precinct_id, precinct_address, city, state FROM precincts WHERE state='California';
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT violation_date, violation_type FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100;
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM drivers WHERE driver_age < 30 ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_year >= 2018 ORDER BY vehicle_year DESC, vehicle_make ASC;
SELECT officer_name, badge_number, department FROM law_enforcement;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations LIMIT 10;
SELECT violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT driver_name, driver_age, driver_address FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_age DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM fines JOIN traffic_violations ON fines.violation_id = traffic_violations.violation_id ORDER BY fines.fine_date DESC;
